text:
Yvon Taillandier (28 March 1926 – 3 March 2018) was a French artist and author. He was born in Paris.
Taillandier critic who was Secretary of the Salon de Mai Committee for 44 years. Taillandier worked for 14 years to the journal "Connaissance des Arts" (Acquaintance with the Arts) and to the "Salon de Mai", "Salon des Réalités Nouvelles", "Salon de la Jeune Peinture", "Salon Comparaisons", "Salon Grands et Jeunes d'Aujourd'hui", "Salon d'Art Sacré" and "Salon Figuration Critique".
Taillandier died in Paris on 3 March 2018 at the age of 91.
